Detailed Description

LanguageResetAction analyzes if the input string has the meaning of an Orange language reset string, that means if it fullfills the following syntax: *#000n#, where n is an integer in the range from 0 to 2, current valid strings are *#0000# - English, *#0001# - German, *#0002# - French.
